DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine and analyse the incidence, severity, risk factors and routine management of acute drug-induced upper gastrointestinal bleeding (UGIB) in the population of Russian patients
DOC.brief_title: Study of Incidence of Drug-induced Upper Gastrointestinal Bleeding
DOC.criteria: Established diagnosis of acute upper gastrointestinal bleeding, confirmed by presence of hematemesis/ coffee ground vomiting, melena, as well as other clinical or laboratory evidence of acute blood loss from the upper gastrointestinal tract Written informed consent provided prior the start of participation in the study. Subjects who are unwilling or unable to provide informed consent.
DOC.keyword: patients with drug-induced upper gastrointestinal bleeding
